definition[0]: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon
example[1]: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events.
definition[1]: willing to give information about something
example[2]: IBM is usually pretty forthcoming about the markets for its products.
definition[2]: if something is forthcoming, it is given or offered when needed â€“ often used to say that this does not happen
example[3]: When no reply was forthcoming, she wrote again.
